name: underdash
description: Make ur GD menu look straight outta undertale

issues.info: Please report issues on the GitHub repository! Or you can just tag/DM me on twitter...

profile.name: Profile Button
profile.description: Whether to show the profile button in the main menu.

geode.name: Geode Button
geode.description: Whether to show the geode button in the main menu.

globed.name: Globed button
globed.description: Whether to show the globed button in the main menu (if globed is installed).

chests.name: Daily chests button
chests.description: Whether to show the daily chest button in the main menu.

quit.name: Quit button
quit.description: Whether to show the quit button in the main menu.

restart.name: Restart button
restart.description: Whether to add a restart button in the main menu.

achievements.name: Achievements button
achievements.description: Whether to show the achievements button in the main menu.

stats.name: Stats button
stats.description: Whether to show the stats button in the main menu.

search.name: Search button
search.description: Whether to show a shortcut to the level search menu in the main menu.

saved.name: Saved levels button
saved.description: Whether to show a shortcut to your saved levels in the main menu. <cr>(not implemented on macOS yet)</c>

create.name: Created levels button
create.description: Whether to show a shortcut to your created levels in the main menu. <cr>(not implemented on macOS yet)</c>

featured.name: Featured levels button
featured.description: Whether to show a shortcut to the featured menu in the main menu. <cr>(not implemented on macOS yet)</c>

daily.name: Daily level button
daily.description: Whether to show a shortcut to the daily level in the main menu. <cr>(not implemented on macOS yet)</c>

weekly.name: Weekly level button
weekly.description: Whether to show a shortcut to the weekly level in the main menu. <cr>(not implemented on macOS yet)</c>

activeIcon.name: Only active icon
activeIcon.description: Whether to only show your selected icon in the menu (Not compatible with the other options)

iconCube.name: Cube
iconCube.description: Whether to add your cube to the menu icons.

iconShip.name: Ship
iconShip.description: Whether to add your ship to the menu icons.

iconBall.name: Ball
iconBall.description: Whether to add your ball to the menu icons.

iconUfo.name: Ufo
iconUfo.description: Whether to add your ufo to the menu icons.

iconWave.name: Wave
iconWave.description: Whether to add your wave to the menu icons.

iconRobot.name: Robot
iconRobot.description: Whether to add your robot to the menu icons.

iconSpider.name: Spider
iconSpider.description: Whether to add your spider to the menu icons.

iconSwing.name: Swing
iconSwing.description: Whether to add your swing to the menu icons.

iconJetpack.name: Jetpack
iconJetpack.description: Whether to add your jetpack to the menu icons.

loadingBar.name: Show loading bar
loadingBar.description: Whether to show the loading bar in the loading screen.

utMusic.name: Replace menu music
utMusic.description: Whether to play a custom undertale menu loop.
